turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm looking at my latest bill and there's a charge here I don't understand. It's for $45 labeled 'Service Upgrade Fee'.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help you look into that billing charge. Could you please provide your account number or the email address associated with your account?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yeah, sure. It's [user email or account number]. This charge is really frustrating because I didn't request any service upgrade. My bill is suddenly higher than expected.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for providing that. I see the $45 charge you're referring to. Our records indicate this fee is related to a recent adjustment to your service plan benefits.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: An 'adjustment'? What does that even mean? I never agreed to any adjustments that would add a fee! Why am I being charged for an 'adjustment' I wasn't explicitly informed about or asked for?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I apologize for the lack of clarity regarding this charge. After reviewing further, it seems this fee was incorrectly applied during a system update related to plan options. It should not have been added to your account. I have processed a credit of $45 to reverse this charge on your current bill. You will see this reflected shortly.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Oh, okay. A system error. That's a relief! Thank you so much for finding that and correcting it. I really appreciate you sorting it out quickly.
